title: Poppy Jungle [Viable?]

replies.body: It's viable.  First clear is kinda annoying, but if you can set up ganks then you're fine.
Her R is sort of.. anti-gank.. The rest of her kit is really not able to gank well, although E and iceborn helps. There are way better junglers that do similar things.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=HWlFIZ8E,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-10-09T19:17:50.882+0000)
>
> Her R is sort of.. anti-gank.. The rest of her kit is really not able to gank well, although E and iceborn helps. There are way better junglers that do similar things.

You don't need to charge it all the way other wise it makes it a perfectly good tool for ganking, E>R>Q>W then its an easy gank especially if you have a top laner that isn't brainless and helps when you gank.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=HWlFIZ8E,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-10-09T19:17:50.882+0000)
>
> Her R is sort of.. anti-gank.. The rest of her kit is really not able to gank well, although E and iceborn helps. There are way better junglers that do similar things.

You don't need to charge up the ult. You can do a perfectly good gank by E+R+Q+W to stop mobility. It's not super optimal unless you're confident you'll get the kill, since you might burn ult for nothing.

> [{quoted}](name=Big Lincoln,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=HWlFIZ8E,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-10-09T19:17:43.919+0000)
>
> better than top imo

She's really strong in lane, but she's still a pretty good jungler.
